name: TheNolanBox
description: TheNolanBox is a Sandbox VR game with TONS of features like Ragdolls,  Weapons, Spiderman web swinging, Tons of music choices,  And a fully functional spawn menu to spawn in everything. Let your creativity fly in TheNolanBox with no rules and nobody to tell you what to do. You could build a tower, then you could destroy it. Or you could bully Nolan. Or just throw around and stab some ragdolls. Whatever it is you want to do TheNolanBox has got you covered. Have fun! and please put any feedback in the comments. (Current Version Alpha 1.0)
